trans-unit.source: Runs a child activity iteratively as long as a certain condition is true.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma atividade subordinada iteratively enquanto uma determinada condição for true.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The WhileActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the WhileActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O WhileActivity é um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, que significa que o WhileActivity pode conter outras atividades.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Before each iteration, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A> property is evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Antes de cada iteração do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A>propriedade é avaliada.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A> property evaluates to `false`, the WhileActivity immediately finishes.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A>propriedade avalia como `false`, o WhileActivity imediatamente termina.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"> </xref> classe com o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome definido pelo utilizador da atividade.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a condition that determines whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"></xref> should run or finish.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma condição que determina se o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"> </xref> deve executar ou concluir.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> class, add the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> class to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> class, and set the Condition property.
trans-unit.target: Exemplo de código seguinte demonstra como criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity>classe, adicione o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity>de classe para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity>classe e defina a propriedade de condição.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity>

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the WhileAndParallel SDK Sample from the WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código faz parte de exemplo de SDK WhileAndParallel do ficheiro WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using While and Parallel](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [utilizando enquanto e paralelo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84).

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[wf_samples#275](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets24.cs#275)] [!code-vb[wf_samples#275](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets24.vb#275)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[wf_samplesē](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets24.cs#275)][!code-vb[wf_samplesē ](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets24.vb#275)]

trans-unit.source: When the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> property evaluates to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"></xref> continues to run.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> propriedade avalia como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"> </xref> continua a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> evaluates to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"></xref> finishes.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> avalia como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"> </xref> terminar.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> que visa a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition*>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition*>

trans-unit.target: Obtém o subordinado dinâmico atividades a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Atividades subordinadas dinâmica no <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"> </xref>.
